com.daw.pms.Service.BiliBili

Interface BiliFavListService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BiliFavListServiceImpl

    public interface BiliFavListService
    Service for handling fav lists of bilibili.
    Since:
    8/2/23
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Daw Loph

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • getFavLists

        Result getFavLists(Integer pn,
                   Integer ps,
                   Long mid,
                   String platform,
                   Integer type,
                   String cookie)
        Get all fav lists of bilibili.
        Parameters:
        pn - Page number.
        ps - Page size.
        mid - Upper's mid.
        platform - The platform, default is web.
        type - 0 for created fav lists, 1 for collected fav lists.
        cookie - Your cookie for bilibili.
        Returns:
        Paged bili fav list wrapped with Result DTO, data is PagedDataDTO<BiliFavList>.
        API Note:
        type==0: GET GET_CREATED_FAV_LISTS?pn=pn&ps=ps&up_mid=mid, type==1: GET GET_COLLECTED_FAV_LISTS?pn=pn&ps=ps&up_mid=mid&platform=platform.

      • getDetailFavList

        Result getDetailFavList(Long id,
                        Integer pn,
                        Integer ps,
                        String keyword,
                        String order,
                        Integer range,
                        Integer type,
                        String cookie)
        Get detail fav list.
        Parameters:
        id - The media id(full id) of the fav list.
        pn - Page number.
        ps - Page size.
        keyword - The keyword of the fav list, for searching specific resources in this fav list.
        order - The order of the resources, mtime: by favorited time, view: by view count, pubtime: by published time, default is mtime.
        range - The range of searching, 0: current fav list, 1: all fav lists, default is 0.
        type - 0 for created fav lists, 1 for collected fav lists.
        cookie - Your cookie for bilibili.
        Returns:
        Detail fav list wrapped with Result DTO, data is BiliDetailFavList.
        API Note:
        type==0: GET GET_DETAIL_CREATED_FAV_LIST?media_id=id&pn=pn&ps=ps&keyword=keyword&order=order&type=range type==1: GET GET_DETAIL_COLLECTED_FAV_LIST?season_id=id&pn=pn&ps=ps

      • createFavList

        Result createFavList(Map<String,String> favList,
                     String cookie)
        Create fav list in bilibili.
        Parameters:
        favList - A map container the properties of the creating fav list.
        cookie - Your cookie for bilibili.
        Returns:
        Result of creating fav list.
        API Note:
        POST CREATE_FAV_LIST {"name":title,"intro":intro,"privacy":privacy,"cover":cover,"csrf":csrf}

      • deleteFavList

        Result deleteFavList(String ids,
                     String cookie)
        Delete fav list in bilibili.
        Parameters:
        ids - The id of deleted fav lists, multiple fav lists' id separated by comma.
        cookie - Your cookie for bilibili.
        Returns:
        Result of deleting fav list.
        API Note:
        POST DELETE_FAV_LIST {"media_ids":ids,"csrf":csrf}

      • editFavList

        Result editFavList(Long id,
                   String title,
                   String intro,
                   Integer privacy,
                   String cover,
                   String cookie)
        Edit the existed fav list.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the fav list.
        title - The new title of the fav list.
        intro - The new introduction of the fav list.
        privacy - The new privacy of the fav list, 0 for public, 1 for private.
        cover - The new cover of the fav list.
        cookie - Your cookie for bilibili.
        Returns:
        Result of editing fav list.
        API Note:
        POST EDIT_FAV_LIST {"media_id":id,"title":title,"intro":intro,"privacy":privacy,"cover":cover,"csrf":csrf}

      • multipleAddResources

        Result multipleAddResources(String srcMediaId,
                            String dstMediaId,
                            Long mid,
                            String resourcesIds,
                            String platform,
                            String cookie)
        Add multiple resources to fav list.
        Parameters:
        srcMediaId - Source fav list's id.
        dstMediaId - Target fav list's id.
        mid - Upper's mid.
        resourcesIds - The id and type of the resources, format is id:type, multiple resources separated by comma, type may be 2: video, 12: audio, 21: videos.
        platform - The platform, default is web.
        cookie - Your cookie for bilibili.
        Returns:
        Result of adding resources to fav list.
        API Note:
        POST MULTI_ADD_RESOURCES {"src_media_id":srcMediaId,"tar_media_id":dstMediaId,"mid":mid,"resources":resourcesIds,"platform":platform,"csrf":csrf}

      • multipleMoveResources

        Result multipleMoveResources(Long srcMediaId,
                             Long dstMediaId,
                             Long mid,
                             String resourcesIds,
                             String platform,
                             String cookie)
        Move multiple resources from one fav list to another.
        Parameters:
        srcMediaId - Source fav list's id.
        dstMediaId - Target fav list's id.
        mid - Upper's mid.
        resourcesIds - The id and type of the resources, format is id:type, multiple resources separated by comma, type may be 2: video, 12: audio, 21: videos.
        platform - The platform, default is web.
        cookie - Your cookie for bilibili.
        Returns:
        Result of moving resources from one fav list to another.
        API Note:
        POST MULTI_MOVE_RESOURCES {"src_media_id":srcMediaId,"tar_media_id":dstMediaId,"mid":mid,"resources":resourcesIds,"platform":platform,"csrf":csrf}

      • multipleDeleteResources

        Result multipleDeleteResources(String resourcesIds,
                               Long mediaId,
                               String platform,
                               String cookie)
        Delete multiple resources from fav list.
        Parameters:
        resourcesIds - The id and type of the resources, format is id:type, multiple resources separated by comma, type may be 2: video, 12: audio, 21: videos.
        mediaId - Fav list's id.
        platform - The platform, default is web.
        cookie - Your cookie for bilibili.
        Returns:
        Result of deleting resources from fav list.
        API Note:
        POST MULTI_DELETE_RESOURCES {"resources":resourcesIds,"media_id":mediaId,"platform":platform,"csrf":csrf}

      • favoriteResourceToFavLists

        Result favoriteResourceToFavLists(Long aid,
                                  Integer type,
                                  String targetFavListsIds,
                                  String cookie)
        Add resource to fav lists.
        Parameters:
        aid - The aid of the resource.
        type - The type of resource, must be 2.
        targetFavListsIds - The id of target fav lists, multiple fav lists' id separated by comma.
        cookie - Your cookie for bilibili.
        Returns:
        Result of adding resource to fav lists.

      • getCsrf

        String getCsrf(String biliCookie)
        Get csrf according to bilibili cookie.
        Parameters:
        biliCookie - Your cookie for bilibili.
        Returns:
        The csrf string.
